member.name: T:Interop.Shortcut.ErrorCode
member.summary: Enumeration for the values of the shortcut response types.

member.name: F:Interop.Shortcut.ErrorCode.None
member.summary: Successful.

member.name: F:Interop.Shortcut.ErrorCode.InvalidParameter
member.summary: Invalid function parameter.

member.name: F:Interop.Shortcut.ErrorCode.OutOfMemory
member.summary: Out of memory.

member.name: F:Interop.Shortcut.ErrorCode.PermissionDenied
member.summary: Permission denied.

member.name: F:Interop.Shortcut.ErrorCode.IoError
member.summary: I/O Error.

member.name: F:Interop.Shortcut.ErrorCode.NotSupported
member.summary: Not supported.

member.name: F:Interop.Shortcut.ErrorCode.ResourceBusy
member.summary: Device or resource busy.

member.name: F:Interop.Shortcut.ErrorCode.NoSpace
member.summary: There is no space to add a new shortcut.

member.name: F:Interop.Shortcut.ErrorCode.Exist
member.summary: Shortcut is already added.

member.name: F:Interop.Shortcut.ErrorCode.Fault
member.summary: Unrecoverable error.

member.name: F:Interop.Shortcut.ErrorCode.NotExist
member.summary: Shortcut does not exist.

member.name: F:Interop.Shortcut.ErrorCode.COMM
member.summary: Connection not established or communication problem.

member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.Shortcut.ShortcutManager
member.summary: This class provides some functions to add or delete a shortcut.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Shortcut.ShortcutManager.Add(Tizen.Applications.Shortcut.HomeShortcutInfo)
member.summary: Adds a shortcut on the home-screen.
member.param: Object that contains the shortcut information.
member.exception: Thrown when an argument is invalid.
Thrown in case the permission is denied.
Thrown when the shortcut is not supported.
Thrown in case of out of memory.
Thrown in case of any internal error.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Shortcut.ShortcutManager.Add(Tizen.Applications.Shortcut.WidgetShortcutInfo)
member.summary: Adds a shortcut on the home-screen.
member.param: Object that contains the shortcut information.
member.exception: Thrown when an argument is invalid.
Thrown in case the permission is denied.
Thrown when the shortcut is not supported.
Thrown in case of out of memory.
Thrown in case of any internal error.

member.summary: Removes a shortcut from home by the ShortcutName.
member.exception: Thrown when an argument is invalid.
Thrown in case the permission is denied.
Thrown when the shortcut is not supported.
Thrown in case of out of memory.
Thrown in case of any internal error.

member.summary: Removes a shortcut from home by the ShortcutInfo.

member.exception: Thrown when an argument is invalid.
Thrown in case the permission is denied.

member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.Shortcut.ShortcutAdded
member.summary: The callback function that is invoked when the add request occurs.
member.param: Object that contains the shortcut information to add.
member.returns: The result of handling a shortcut add request.

member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.Shortcut.ShortcutDeleted
member.summary: The callback function that is invoked when the delete request occurs.
member.param: Object that contains the shortcut information to delete.
member.returns: The result of handling a shortcut delete request.

member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.Shortcut.ShortcutEventManager
member.summary: This class provides a way to register the callback function for the shortcut add and delete events.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Shortcut.ShortcutEventManager.RegisterEventHandler(Tizen.Applications.Shortcut.ShortcutAdded)
member.summary: Registers a callback function to listen requests from the applications.
member.param: The callback function pointer that is invoked when Add() is requested.
member.remarks: Previous registered delegate function should be unregistered.
member.exception: Thrown when an argument is invalid.
Thrown in case the permission is denied.
Thrown when the shortcut is not supported.
Thrown in case of out of memory.
Thrown in case of any internal error.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Shortcut.ShortcutEventManager.RegisterEventHandler(Tizen.Applications.Shortcut.ShortcutDeleted)
member.summary: Registers a callback function to listen requests from the applications.
member.param: The callback function pointer that is invoked when Delete() is requested.
member.remarks: Previous registered delegate function should be unregistered.
member.exception: Thrown when an argument is invalid.
Thrown in case the permission is denied.
Thrown when the shortcut is not supported.
Thrown in case of out of memory.
Thrown in case of any internal error.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Shortcut.ShortcutEventManager.UnregisterEventHandler(Tizen.Applications.Shortcut.ShortcutAdded)
member.summary: Unregisters a callback for the shortcut request.
member.param: The callback function pointer that is used for RegisterCallback.
member.exception: Thrown when an argument is invalid.
Thrown in case the permission is denied.
Thrown when the shortcut is not supported.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Shortcut.ShortcutEventManager.UnregisterEventHandler(Tizen.Applications.Shortcut.ShortcutDeleted)
member.summary: Unregisters a callback for the shortcut request.
member.param: The callback function pointer that is used for RegisterCallback.
member.exception: Thrown when an argument is invalid.
Thrown in case the permission is denied.
Thrown when the shortcut is not supported.
